name: cosmic-engine
description: Cosmic Engine is An AI agent that can ingest, traverse and play around with any kind of media. URLS, Pdfs, ppts, images, docs, tables, etc. Build as a custom made RAG model, It is able to fetch and traverse files for quick answers. Unlike traditional LLMs it can manipulate large files of any type, and retrieve information - or build on it recursively.

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: echo "No linting configured for backend yet"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist

author: Arpan Taneja
